title: Michael Rosenbaum (Special Guest) - The GameOverGreggy Show Ep. 9
description:
Smallville's Lex Luthor -- Michael Rosenbaum -- comes to the show to discuss the sexiest comic book characters, movies, and Nick's beard. 

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE/BUY T-SHIRTS: http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

Each and every Monday, Greg, Colin, Nick, and Tim get together to talk. Each podcaster brings a topic to the table, and then, they go. TV, space, books, movies -- anything goes.
